page.title: 11A FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: On Friday night after school I walked to Rachels.when I got there we talked for a while.I had to go home to go to my Grans.When we arrived at my Grans we talked and watched the TV.At half past five we went to pick my Mum up from work.In the evening I watched TV and went to bed at 9 o'clock. On Saturday I got up at 9 o'clock .Later onI went to call on Hannah for lunch I had pancakes and chips.At 4 o'clock I went to the Water Festival in town.It was good they had different side shows and boat races. On sunday when I got up I helped my Mum tidy up the house because my Gran was coming We had lunch at 1 'o clock we had a Sunday lunch In the after noon I played cards with my Gran.At 7.00 my Gran went home I had a bath and washed my hair.I went to bed at 9.00
